EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Oklahoma City Workshop_Q415.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud Platform Seminar - Oklahoma
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Tuesday, October 27, 2015 Colcord Hotel 15 N. Robinson Ave Oklahoma, OK 73102 REGISTER <http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-platform-seminar/oklahoma> Join Pinnacle and Pivotal Technologists and learn how to build and deploy great software on a modern cloud platform. At this workshop, you’ll get hands-on experience as you test drive Pivotal's Cloud Foundry platform. In just a few hours, you’ll realize the speed and ease of pushing an application on Pivotal Cloud Foundry. WHO SHOULD ATTEND The workshops cover topics of interest to developers, architects, operations and technical managers. The keynote sets the stage for the workshops and will provide valuable insights for all. Register <http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-platform-seminar/oklahoma> now for this exclusive event. The workshop is FREE; space is limited. AGENDA
12:00 PM - 12:30 AM Registration & Lunch
12:30 PM - 1:15 PM Software Kept Eating the World
1:15 PM - 1:30 PM Coffee Break
1:30 PM - 2:30 PM How Developers Experience Cloud Foundry
2:30 PM - 3:30 PM How Cloud Foundry enables Continuous Delivery
3:30 PM - 4:00 PM Closing Comments and Next Steps Todd Williams, Account Executive at Pivotal VIEW FULL AGENDA <http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-platform-seminar/oklahoma>
